title: [#592] Application Form: "Diversity" field
body_html:
Closes #592

One thing to think about: this field is not hidden during the blind phase at the moment. Together with other information people may mention their age and location there, which we kinda don't want to know before the non-blind phase. Should we ask students not to mention this info?

There was the issue "Blind selection warning" (#587), but it only applies to the fields which go below the 'Basics' section.

body:
Closes https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/592

One thing to think about: this field is not hidden during the blind phase at the moment. Together with other information people may mention their age and location there, which we kinda don't want to know before the non-blind phase. Should we ask students not to mention this info?

There was the issue "Blind selection warning" (https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/587), but it only applies to the fields which go below the 'Basics' section.
